methods.name: addClass
methods.doc:
Adds one or more CSS classes to the node's UI element.
Duplicate classes are automatically filter...

methods.name: getAnchor
methods.doc: Returns the <a> element that provides focus for the node's UI.

methods.name: getEl
methods.doc: Returns the element which encapsulates this node.

methods.name: isChecked
methods.doc:
Returns the checked status of the node. If the node was rendered with no
checkbox, it returns false.

methods.name: removeClass
methods.doc: Removes one or more CSS classes from the node's UI element.

methods.name: toggleCheck
methods.doc:
Sets the checked status of the tree node to the passed value, or, if no value was passed,
toggles...
